module, connection, class, activity, topology, process plant
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application to record classes of connection between classes of activity.
The nature of a connection between individual activities may be specified by indicating a class of connection of which it is a member.
The relationship 'maintain for operation' between:
the class of activity 'maintain mechanical equipment'; and
the class of activity 'operate mechanical equipment',
that indicates there is a flow of material objects, documents and information in both directions between the two activities, is a class_of_connection_of_activity.
The cardinality for this relationship is follows:
a maintain mechanical equipment activity is connected to zero one or many operate mechanical equipment activities;
an operate mechanical equipment activity is connected to one or many maintain mechanical equipment activities.
The cardinality for the relationship is within the scope of the Cardinality_of_relationship application module.
a mapping between one class of activity and another that indicates the nature of a connection relationship between two individual activities.
connection between individual activities; A connection between individual activities is within the scope of the connection_of_individual_activity application module.
membership of a class of connection of activity; Membership of a class of connection of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.
The Class_of_connection_of_activity UoF identifies a class of connection of activity and defines the classes of activity that are connection.
